data.meta_description: LocatED | 2,285 followers on LinkedIn. The arms-length body providing expert property advice to the education sector and government. | We provide expert property advice to the education sector and government, helping develop estates strategy, acquire new sites and progress decarbonisation.

Learners could see how climate change impacts their everyday lives, which really helped drive home the need to take action. ğŸ’¡ Learning from each other: Encouraging open discussions between people at all levelsâ€”whether they were students on work experience or senior execsâ€”made a huge impact. It showed how we can work together and share ideas to find practical solutions to climate challenges. ğŸ‘¥ Teamwork creates a ripple effect: Carbon literacy goes beyond just individual actions. By sparking group discussions about larger-scale solutionsâ€”like decarbonising the education estate - we could see how the training could influence wider change beyond our own immediate sphere. The results so far: ğŸš€ People felt much more confident in making their own carbon reduction pledges, when they were empowered to set specific, measurable goals âš’ Weâ€™ve seen the beginnings of group projects focused on innovative areas like sustainable procurement and energy-efficient building practices ğŸ“’ Communication about the science of climate change and the development of our own pledges has helped spark broader commitments and actions for meaningful change at all levels ğŸŒ± #Sustainability #NetZero #CarbonLiteracy #ClimateAction The Carbon Literacy Project
